usefulItems: fine mesh sieve, ceramic or glass bowl
title: Lime glaze

preparations.content: Place all ingredients into mixing bowl and cook <b>20-25 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>, or until consistency has thickened, placing simmering basket instead of measuring cup onto mixing bowl lid.
Strain glaze through a fine mesh sieve into a ceramic or glass bowl, then set aside to cool completely or until ready to use.

hintsAndTricks: The glaze will thicken as it cools. To test if your glaze is cooked, place a metal spoon into the mixture. The glaze should coat the back of the spoon in a nice thick syrup-consistency.
